A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have loved Star Wars my whole life and I am 38. This movie is by far the worst. All it needed was jar jar bins. The characters acted so out of character it was ridiculous. And what was with the cheesy jokes. Yoda didn't even have a wise and serious moment. I am disappointed in every character and the direction or ending they took. I did not gain any worthwhile story from it either. This one should have do over!!
